name: Rainbow Rose
headAddress: Rue Du Triolet, Batiment A, 335, ap. 13
goal: The aims of the association are fighting against all types of discrimination based on societal principles/morals; campaigning for an equality of rights for Lesbian Gay Bi Trans and Intersex people (LGBTI); advancing LGBTI people’s rights in the political agenda of the Party of European Socialists (PES) and its member parties; and the promotion of social democratic values in Europe.
interests: General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
- Anti-discrimination directive outside of workplace

More generally all files linked with fight against discrimination, equal access and related to LGBTI issues in Europe and in the world.
